description:
Hyoh regains his memories, and upon hearing of Hyoh`s reconciliation with Kenshiro, Kaioh does a complete about-face. Heavy with anger towards Shachi at having made their reconciliation possible, Kaioh orders the Asuras to hunt Shachi down. Meanwhile, Hyoh has recovered from the worst of his injuries, and tells Kenshiro and Shachi that there is a hidden technique sealed within the Holy Temple of Asura, the sanctum of the main family of the North Star. Leia and Lin`s love opens the way to the hidden technique`s hiding place, and underground, under the watchful gaze of female visages, Kaioh and Shachi do battle...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shachi se bat au nom de l`amour ! Pour Kaio, tout ceci est ridicule !!
Shachi`s Battle for Love! Kaioh Will Ridicule with Laughter!
